body: Maybe the same issue as here https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/6948 but I am not sure

Server2 is also hangs while calling Server1:

"grpc 6 (cq 6)" tid=0x0x7f0f8f7fb700 this=0x0x7f0fbf5ab830 thread handle 0x11e3 state : not waiting owns ()
  at <unknown> <0xffffffff>
  at (wrapper managed-to-native) object.wrapper_native_0x7f0fbc66ea10 (Grpc.Core.Internal.CompletionQueueSafeHandle) <0xffffffff>
  at (wrapper delegate-invoke) <Module>.invoke_CompletionQueueEvent_CompletionQueueSafeHandle (Grpc.Core.Internal.CompletionQueueSafeHandle) <0xffffffff>
  at Grpc.Core.Internal.CompletionQueueSafeHandle.Next () <0x00030>
  at Grpc.Core.Internal.GrpcThreadPool.RunHandlerLoop (Grpc.Core.Internal.CompletionQueueSafeHandle) <0x0004b>
  at Grpc.Core.Internal.GrpcThreadPool/<>c__DisplayClass6.<CreateAndStartThread>b__5 () <0x00017>
  at System.Threading.ThreadHelper.ThreadStart_Context (object) <0x00099>
  at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.RunInternal (System.Threading.ExecutionContext,System.Threading.ContextCallback,object,bool) <0x0016e>
  at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run (System.Threading.ExecutionContext,System.Threading.ContextCallback,object,bool) <0x00020>
  at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run (System.Threading.ExecutionContext,System.Threading.ContextCallback,object) <0x00059>
  at System.Threading.ThreadHelper.ThreadStart () <0x0002e>
  at (wrapper runtime-invoke) object.runtime_invoke_void__this__ (object,intptr,intptr,intptr) <0xffffffff>

Server1 sometimes receives exceptions like below:

```
java.io.IOException: Connection reset by peer
at sun.nio.ch.FileDispatcherImpl.read0(native)
```

Wireshark is also show packets with RST flag in communication between Server2 and client
